title: Create Meal Logging Form Components for VitaTrack
instruction: Implement comprehensive meal logging form components for VitaTrack nutrition tracking. Create meal creation forms, food quantity input, portion size estimation, and meal timing selection. Implement meal templates, quick-add functionality, and meal photo upload. Setup nutrition summary display, goal progress tracking, and meal sharing options. Include form validation, auto-save functionality, and offline meal logging capability. Create meal editing, deletion, and duplication features.
